programme.title: The Good Doctor S3
programme.desc: When Dr. Shaun Murphy makes an emotional confession, the result may not be as desired. Meanwhile, he becomes obsessed with performing an autopsy on a Jane Doe, which challenges his relationships at the hospital; the other doctors treat a college student with a mysterious split personality disorder.

programme.title: Britain's Got Talent S13
programme.desc: Viewers can expect to be amazed by an incredible line-up of acts competing to be crowned this years winner, from comedians and contortionists through to singers and dancers. Once again the judges will be saying yes to the acts that impress and buzzing off the acts that fail to make the mark, with the added excitement of the Golden Buzzer for the acts that have that extra-special something.

programme.title: Britain's Got Talent S13
programme.desc: Viewers can expect to be amazed by an incredible line-up of acts competing to be crowned this years winner, from comedians and contortionists through to singers and dancers. Once again the judges will be saying yes to the acts that impress and buzzing off the acts that fail to make the mark, with the added excitement of the Golden Buzzer for the acts that have that extra-special something.

programme.title: Open Homes S2
programme.desc: The world renowned 'Ocean House', the 3 Chimney House, a canal front garden on the GoldCoast and Yungaba House - a historic manor restored to its former glory.

programme.title: Food Notes
programme.desc: Traditional medicine theories come into play in Korean herbal cuisine where certain food can be considered "medicine", and poisonous ingredients like sulfur and puffer fish are used to dispel ill health. Join us in this episode of Food Notes to discover the amazing world of Herbal Cuisine in Korea!

programme.title: Micro Monsters
programme.desc: Natural historian, David Attenborough, takes us inside the lives of arthropods, the spiders, scorpions, and insects that make up more than 80% of the animal kingdom.

programme.title: Young Blood
programme.desc: In the wild, Mother Nature shows no mercy. In order to make it to adulthood, animal babies have to learn and perfect their own cunning tactics to outwit and out manoeuvre the dangers they face.

programme.title: WITZ!
programme.desc: Witz is an educational-adventure series that is set on a magical island. Each week we follow the three fun-loving inhabitants as they embark on a magical mission where they learn new things and explore new places.

programme.title: Bugsville
programme.desc: Bugsville is an entertaining and educational pre-school programme featuring NATALIE, her parents (Mary and Fred) and her friends. The show will feature live action filmed in home sets as well as composited CGI shot in a green screen studio.

programme.title: Zou S3
programme.desc: Join Zou the zebra and his family and friends for more daily adventures of discovery and exploration!

programme.title: Gigantosaurus S1
programme.desc: Rocky, Bill, Tiny and Mazu are four young dinosaurs growing up in the Cretaceous period. Life is always an adventure... and Gigantosaurus, the biggest, fiercest dinosaur, reigns over it all!

programme.title: Counting With Paula S5
programme.desc: The lights in the playroom go out. Being in the dark is scary, but the children learn about a candle with an everlasting light! To retrieve it, they have to face their fears and enter the darkest cave ever! Maurice accidentally bends Redbeard's hook out of shape. The children help Redbeard find some rather unique replacement hooks but Redbeard is sceptical about how useful they actually are.

programme.title: Ollie And Friends S6
programme.desc: The gang participate in the town's Treasure Hunt. But when the Imp decides to cheat, he puts them in harm's way and risks their chances of winning the treasure chest. The Shifty Squares form a busking act in order to earn enough money to buy the Yellow Square a drum. The gang try to help the Blue Square earn more money by forming their own band, but this makes the Yellow Square jealous.

programme.title: Super Wings S5: Super Pets
programme.desc: A young boy living in Austria named Lukas asks Jett to deliver a wagon that is big enough to carry a large aquarium, so he can take his pet catfish Captain Jack with him to the local water park.

programme.title: The Deep S1
programme.desc: The series follows the Nekton family, a family of adventurous underwater explorers who live aboard a state-of-the-art submarine, the Aronnax, and explore unknown areas of the Earth's oceans to unravel the mysteries of the depths.

programme.title: Power Players
programme.desc: Sarge Charge has hidden his secret weapon in the Power Players' HQ, protected by a security system. When the Power Players' curiosity gets the better of them, they end up being locked out of the house... just as Madcap manages to sneak inside!

programme.title: Mind Blown!
programme.desc: Singapore used to be part of Malaya and the British empire. Both have royal families. So why don't we have kings and queens anymore? Is our history really that boring? Mindblown goes back to the 14th Century to find out what happened to our Malay Kings.

programme.title: Time Traveler Luke
programme.desc: Luke saves Jeanne D'arc from being kidnapped by Jeff, who leaves behind a mysterious cube that will lead to the location of his lost friends...

programme.title: Wild Kratts S6
programme.desc: Join the Kratt Brothers in a new season of WILD KRATTS, the fun and fact-packed series!

programme.title: MasterChef Singapore S2
programme.desc: It's time to push the contestants of the comfort zone and test their ability to cook international cuisines. The Winning Dish will gain the most coveted advantage in MasterChef - an immunity pin that keeps them safe from the elimination.

programme.title: Asia Unplated With Diana Chan
programme.desc: Each episode focuses on a different cuisine, showcasing a variety of traditional and modern dishes from each country. Along the way, we join Diana as she explores the local shops, restaurants and markets, providing tips and advice for sourcing ingredients for each dish. Then it's back to her kitchen where Diana cooks up simple but authentic, home-style Asian dishes.

programme.title: America's Got Talent: The Champions
programme.desc: The premise is to round up the winners and/or most notable contestants from seasons 1-13 and have them face off head-to-head to see who is the ultimate America's Got Talent top act. America's Got Talent: The Champions will not just showcase the very best from the U.S. apparently. The show will pull top acts from global versions of the AGT franchise too.

programme.title: Films & Stars
programme.desc: Films and Stars cover the hottest events from the big screen every week.

programme.title: NINJAGO - Secrets Of The Forbidden Spinjitzu
programme.desc: Series centres on the fictional world of Ninjago, telling the story of a group of teen Ninja and their battles against the forces of evil.

programme.title: Inazuma Eleven
programme.desc: Mamoru End is a very talented goalkeeper and the grandson of one of the strongest goalkeepers in Japan, who died before he was born. Even though his skills are incredible, his school lacks a real soccer club as the six other members don't appear very interested even in training. The young goalkeeper sets out to find and recruit members for his soccer team.

programme.title: Pokemon the Series: Sun & Moon - Ultra Legends S22
programme.desc: This season follows the final adventures of Ash Ketchum and his classmates at the Pokemon school in the Alola region.

programme.title: Bakugan Battle Planet
programme.desc: Bakugan Battle Planet follows the adventures of Dan and his best friends, the first kids on Earth to bond with the mysterious alien creatures known as Bakugan!

programme.title: Metalions
programme.desc: Follow the adventures of Elon, an 8-year-old inventor whose world changes forever when he discovers his role as a protector for the Earth and its environment!

programme.title: Mr Bean's Holiday
programme.desc: Mr. Bean wins a trip to Cannes where he unwittingly separates a young boy from his father and must help the two reunite. On the way he discovers France, bicycling, and true love.

programme.title: President's Star Charity 2021
programme.desc: (Live) Catch the President's Star Charity 2021 for a showcase of uplifting performances and support the good cause! Themed "Love Connects", this year's President's Star Charity aims to rally all in Singapore to build a more digitally inclusive society and help those in need.

programme.title: News Tonight
programme.desc: The daily evening-news programme featuring highlights and coverage of both local and international news with a local perspective.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible II
programme.desc: IMF agent Ethan Hunt is sent to Sydney to find and destroy a genetically modified disease called "Chimera".

programme.title: Being James Bond

programme.title: The World's Deadliest Drivers
programme.desc: In this series, we see hilarious, outrageous and hazardous footage taken directly from streets around the globe. From the motorcyclist who ended up back-flipping off a cliff, to the have-a-go hero who pulled a grandmother out of a burning car.

programme.desc: Rody and the mouse, White, succeed in rescuing all the animals in the BM lab. Rody and White walk to Green Forest, where Rody is originally from, but they can't find it because the forest has turned into a construction site. programme.title: Ready Jet Go! S2
programme.desc: Mindy has been told that she needs to go to bed when the Sun goes down, and she is determined that the Sun shouldn't set on the fun day that she's having with her friends, so she asks Jet and the others to help her keep the Sun from going down. Even though they understand that these ideas are not practical, they decide to humor Mindy, and try all kinds of ways to "hold onto the Sun".

programme.title: Rusty Rivets S3
programme.desc: An engineer named Rusty leads a team of rescue robots. Together, they invent their way out of difficult situations.

programme.desc: The children are really looking forward to watching the meteor shower, but they have trouble finding a place with a good view of it. Two superhero teams compete to be the one and only superhero team of the Far East. Who will win?

programme.desc: In this brand new version of the beloved series, Thomas travels full steam ahead across five continents, discovering magnificent new sights and experiencing exciting places and cultures.

programme.title: Ollie And Friends S7
programme.desc: An Egyptian sceptre has been stolen from the Ollipolis museum but the security footage shows the culprit looks a little like Triangle Man, the museum's security guard! Can he undo the damages and pursue his dreams?

For Grizzy, it's a super-practical way of being waited on by feathered servants, while the Lemmings see it as a golden opportunity to have a squadron which obeys at the drop of a dime.

programme.title: Grizzy & The Lemmings S2

programme.title: Space Nova
programme.desc: While travelling to complete a supply drop off at a research facility, the Novas crash land on the planet only to be confronted by a deadly gravity storm that threatens not only their lives - and the lives of the researchers they find there - but also their life-saving work!

Under the guidance of Optimus Prime, Heatwave and Boulder they aim to one day be super heroes in their own right.

programme.title: Exlosers S4
programme.desc: Clan discusses running away with Daisy when Cheryl appears. He thinks she is going send him to a foster home. He runs off to see his grandmother who is still in ICU. The nurse takes Clan's blood sample. At the tuition center, the rest are still not convinced Benny is not Mr Gross. Janice is frustrated with Auntie Peggie for borrowing money from loan sharks, and she tries to help. And Daryl suspects Catherine's job at the tuition center is not what she said it is.

programme.title: Fighting Spiders
programme.desc: Set in post 60's Singapore, in rustic kampongs, and the colorful chaotic streets of Chinatown, FIGHTING SPIDERS is a coming of age, adventure, story of three boys - Soon Lee (Edwin Goh), Charlie (Liang Shijie Jason) and Peter (Frederick Fielding), whose friendship is tested when they go to Malaysia on a quest to find and return with the King Spider, so as to challenge their nemesis, and bully, Ah Huat.

programme.title: 小娘惹
programme.desc: (重) 故事从30年代展开，横跨70年至现今。黄菊香生于海峡华人（峇峇娘惹）的大家庭，是出生卑微的小姨太之女。大时代的动荡，让菊香饱受折磨，她的丈夫死了，她也死了，留下年纪仅8岁的月娘。二战结束后，逃难到英国的外祖父携家眷回到马来亚，月娘就像当年的母亲一样，被歧视、毒打、折磨，她为了保护外婆，忍辱负重，承受一切的痛苦。月娘被卖给杀猪贩刘一刀当妻子。月娘不甘心自己的一生交由其他人摆弄，宁可结束自己的生命。她刚烈的个性，让刘一刀敬佩，与她结拜为兄妹。月娘决定寻找自己的一条出路，她开始学习做生意，过程中，她被劣.

programme.title: 祖先保佑2

programme.title: 祖先保佑2

programme.title: 做飯的男人
programme.desc: (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩) 绍源要求信慕到公寓去照顾汉洁。信慕骗英惠他必须去吊唁，找机会离开家里到公寓去。英惠起疑，到公寓去一探究竟。邮差送亲子鉴定报告到公寓去。英惠拆开来看，发现委托人信慕和汉洁是亲子关系.

programme.title: 做飯的男人
programme.desc: (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩) 英惠以为信慕有私生女，深受打击。绍源本来要承认汉洁是他的女儿，燕珠和春玉却在这个时候抵达公寓凑热闹。信慕为了顾全绍源的婚姻，只好说汉洁是他的女儿，并向英惠道歉.

programme.title: 捉迷藏

programme.title: 捉迷藏

programme.title: 地球那一边
programme.desc: (重) 中国淮安的“行走学校"每年接收80多名被父母拐骗过来，成绩品行不理想的“差生"。训练营通过半军事化管理、长途行走和各种训练，灌输纪律和刻苦等价值观。李心钰将随师生们走上一段300多公里的行军路程。.

programme.title: 边缘人
programme.desc: (重) 婚姻原本是一对男女的美好结合，却成为印度女童的噩梦。童年时光本该无忧无虑，她们却已嫁为人妻。这些小新娘被社会遗忘，命运由丈夫掌控，一生犹如扯线木偶。随着人们对童婚的意识提高，她们是否能逃出噩运？.

programme.title: 富家公子
programme.desc: (PG)(双声道-中/韩) 泰一有一些文件放在家里没带。西喜自告奋勇去他家里拿，却无意中看见泰一藏起的食谱笔记本和英荷的照片。.

programme.title: 地球的庆典
programme.desc: (PG) 欢迎收看地球的庆典！我来到了比利时！说到比利时，大家应该都会想到尿尿小童、巧克力、联合国、钻石之类的，这些东西这次我都不会介绍！为什么？因为这次我们收到了比利时旅游局的邀请，请我们来到南方的「瓦隆大区」。瓦隆大区在哪里咧？比利时全名为「比利时王国」，这个国家在1830年独立，位在荷兰／法国之间，又曾是两国领土的一部分，独立后分为两大区。北部「佛莱明大区」：靠近荷兰，讲荷语。南部「瓦隆大区」：靠近法国，讲法语。那慕尔位比利时中南部，是两条河流汇流处－默兹河＆桑布尔河。是专属比利时人的渡假胜地！外国.

programme.title: 我的爱丽丝
programme.desc: (PG13-暴力镜头)(双声道-中/韩) 当镇谦知道杨宏燮抓了度妍后，毫不犹豫地向杨宏燮开了枪，并急忙送昏倒的金度妍就医。敏赫来接躺在加护病房的杨宏燮回未来，并用枪射伤了在外守监的东浩。.

programme.title: 寻医
programme.desc: 每10名菲律宾人病死当中，仍有6人临死前无法得到医疗照顾。主持人吴俐璇千里迢迢到与世隔绝的沙坦岛，拜访在孤岛下乡行医的年轻医生，了解他如何在资源匮乏的环境下，只身照顾将近2000名岛民.

programme.title: 地球的孤儿
programme.desc: 纽西兰的国鸟「奇异鸟」Kiwi就是无翼鸟。为了保育无翼鸟，一场号称地球上最有野心的抢救濒危物种计划，正在铺天盖地地执行。纽西兰政府下达「天敌追杀令」，宣示在2050年以前，灭绝国土上所有的老鼠，此外家猫也有宵禁，晚上六点以后通通不能出门。主持人白心仪前往南半球的净土，寻找神秘的奇异鸟，探索萤火虫洞，跟着毛利船长，追踪抹香鲸的踪迹.

programme.title: 爱到最后
programme.desc: 崔德培因涉嫌诈骗英玉和杀害艾蜜莉被逮捕。世娜指使催司机到看守所与崔德培见面时将一颗药丸拿给崔德培吃。崔德培出现中毒症状，被送入院。世娜派人到医院帮助崔德培逃走.

programme.title: 罪孽牢笼
programme.desc: Ep 34:阿撤发现阿丁和蕾奴关系匪浅，担心抢劫的事情败露，把阿丁的脸刮伤还抢走金项链。玛拉为了证明所怀的孩子是阿四的，竟大声诅咒阿四。Ep 35:阿四溺死，玛拉对诅咒成真感到非常自责。蕾奴赶往达利县找阿才，希望阿才可以回去陪阿月但她却觉得阿才的心已经离她越来越远了。Ep 36:皮莱嫉妒蕾奴怀孕，看到阿才带了阿恩小姐一起出席阿四的丧礼，幸灾乐祸之余还问蕾奴自己的东西被抢是什么感觉.

programme.title: 地球的庆典
programme.desc: (PG)(重) 欢迎收看地球的庆典！我来到了比利时！说到比利时，大家应该都会想到尿尿小童、巧克力、联合国、钻石之类的，这些东西这次我都不会介绍！为什么？因为这次我们收到了比利时旅游局的邀请，请我们来到南方的「瓦隆大区」。瓦隆大区在哪里咧？比利时全名为「比利时王国」，这个国家在1830年独立，位在荷兰／法国之间，又曾是两国领土的一部分，独立后分为两大区。北部「佛莱明大区」：靠近荷兰，讲荷语。南部「瓦隆大区」：靠近法国，讲法语。那慕尔位比利时中南部，是两条河流汇流处－默兹河＆桑布尔河。是专属比利时人的渡假胜地.
